Description: JOB OBJECTIVE- To coordinate and carry out the prompt delivery of supply of petrol/diesel to petrol station customers in accordance with safety standards & regulations.Skills
Skills: 3 years of relevant experience in LDO Department or experience in oil and gas organization
• Knowledge of Fuel Distribution Processes including LDO Department
• Knowledge of business process mapping and relevant change management tools
• Advanced Microsoft Office skills (Project, PowerPoint, Excel and Word)
• Ability to collaborate and communicate effectively
